desc: Shop the Stoov® Quality Dutch designed portable infrared heating cushions, pads, blankets & electric heaters. Stay warm & comfortable everywhere you go. Anytime. You'll never have to experience cold again. Free EU shipping form €98. Feel free to try any of our products at home for 30 days. 100% Satisfaction Guarantee.
